content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity generator at position(-18.5, 19.5)
Consists of steam engine (position -18.5, 19.5), boiler (position -13.5, 20.0), and offshore pump (position -11.5, 26.5). The steam engine is currently operational, while the boiler is out of fuel.

### Copper plate mine at position(5.0, -73.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position 5.0, -73.0) and a furnace (position -18.0, -49.0).

### Copper cable factory at position(-21.5, 25.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Assembling machine (position -21.5, 25.5) set to produce Automation Science Pack, which requires copper plates and iron gear wheels.
- Beltgroup connecting the furnace at position -18.0, -49.0 to the assembling machine at position -21.5, 25.5.

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing.

### Errors related to missing resources for crafting
- Ensure you have all required ingredients in your inventory before attempting to craft items, especially for the assembling machine producing Automation Science Pack, which currently lacks copper plates and iron gear wheels.
